Context: The Centre for Business at George Brown College is accepting donations to support student scholarships. Your entire gift will go towards student scholarships, and you will receive a charitable tax receipt. To learn more about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and other information, sign up on their website or contact them via phone at 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) or email at ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Their social media hub can also be visited for more information. The college's website contents are subject to change without notice, and it is important for students to verify their fee requirements directly with the college.
